00008 #include "parameterseditor.h"
00009 #include "parametersdelegate.h"
00010 
00011 #include <models/component.h>
00012 
00013 #include <QHeaderView>
00014 
00015 ParametersEditor::ParametersEditor(QSharedPointer<Component> component, QWidget *parent): 
00016 ItemEditor(component, parent),
00017 addRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00018 removeRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this),
00019 view_(this), model_(&(component->getParameters()), this), 
00020 proxy_(NULL) {
00021 
00022         connect(&addRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00023                 &model_, SLOT(onAddRow()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00024         connect(&removeRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00025                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00026 
00027         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00028                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00029         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00030                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00032                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00033         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00034                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00035 
00036         // set view to be sortable
00037         view_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00038         view_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00039         view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::ResizeToContents);
00040         view_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00041         view_.setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00042         //view_.setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00043         view_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00044         view_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::AllEditTriggers);
00045         view_.setWordWrap(true);
00046 
00047         view_.setItemDelegate(new ParametersDelegate(this));
00048 
00049         // set proxy to do the sorting automatically
00050         proxy_ = new QSortFilterProxyModel(this);
00051 
00052         // set source model for proxy
00053         proxy_->setSourceModel(&model_);
00054         // set proxy to be the source for the view
00055         view_.setModel(proxy_);
00056 
00057         // sort the view
00058         view_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00059 
00060         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00061         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00062         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00063         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00064 
00065         // create the layout, add widgets to it
00066         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00067         layout->addWidget(&view_);
00068         layout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00069 
00070         model_.restore();
00071 }
00072 
00073 ParametersEditor::~ParametersEditor() {
00074 }
00075 
00076 bool ParametersEditor::isValid() const {
00077         return model_.isValid();
00078 }
00079 
00080 void ParametersEditor::onRemove() {
00081         QModelIndex index = proxy_->mapToSource(view_.currentIndex());
00082 
00083         // if index is valid then remove the row
00084         if (index.isValid())
00085                 model_.onRemoveRow(index.row());
00086 }
00087 
00088 void ParametersEditor::makeChanges() {
00089         model_.apply();
00090 }
